dct_description_sm: Pubd. for the Journal of the Royal Geographical Socy. by J. Murray Albemarle Strt. London 1862 ; J. Arrowsmith.
Shows waterways, villages, region names, roads, missions.
Descriptive text, such as "Flat Bush Country," "Reeds."
Journal of the Royal Geographic Society, v. 32, between pages 334-335.
